RoundPegg

Roundpegg takes a different approach at the whole industry of hiring. Resumes donâ€™t mean much when you are trying to hire a team to eat, work, and basically live together when working on projects. Their personalities need to compliment each other as well as their skills.

The Approach for the illustrations & design were based around the existing logo and getting some new wave inspiration off the product itself.
